RHighlight.p: The ambiance at Villa Shinta Dewi Seminyak is very tranquil, especially with the sound of the waterfall. There’s lots of privacy, and a variety of places to chill, the staff kept out of sight yet were there when we needed them. We particularly liked the open-air lounge, and the gym was an unexpected bonus.

RSurroundArea.p:
For folks who enjoy the beach, a sophisticated nightlife, eating out in classy restaurants and shopping at designer boutiques, Villa Shinta Dewi is positioned in the perfect spot, while being down a cul-du-sac helps keep most of the noise of the immediate location at bay. Many of the restaurants and shops are within easy walking distance, and taxis cruise by every few minutes if you need to go further afield. Sarong, Métis, and Sardine are just three of the high-end dining options in the vicinity. Mid-range options include Wah Burger, which specialises in sassy gourmet burgers with sexy connotations, and there are numerous cheap and cheerful options as well.
Petitenget Beach (the closest beach to the villa) is the western extension of the Seminyak/Legian/Kuta beach. Here you can rent sunbeds and umbrellas, surf, swim between the flags in the areas patrolled by lifeguards, or take long seaside walks. Easiest access to the beach is via the laneway leading to ‘La Lucciola’ Restaurant – which is great for sunset drinks – or alternatively you can take an armchair seat to watch the sunset from a beachside terrace at The Breeze at The Samaya (50m from the villa). Otherwise, Ku Dé Ta (500m) or Potato Head Beachclub (1km) are the places to see and be seen – especially around sunset. Nightlife within five minutes’ walking distance of the villa includes The Living Room which becomes lively after dinner guests have finished eating. Jalan Kayu Aya (aka Jalan Laksmana) is also full of designer boutiques, with another wonderful selection on the main road in Seminyak along with many stylish homeware stores. Just further afield in Kerobokan there are countless antique shops and furniture workshops and showrooms.

ROverallComments.p:
Villa Shinta Dewi Seminyak is such a pretty villa; it brought grins to our faces as soon as we walked in. And we were given such a warm greeting by the staff, with a frangipani garland each, a welcome drink and cool refreshing towel. The villa is built around an inner courtyard dominated by the pool, and although there’s not much garden the plants and flowering trees are gorgeous. The interiors are also lovely, with very comfortable sofas, chairs, beds and sunbeds, and sophisticated soft furnishings. It’s a tasteful, grown up villa, and this is also reflected in the service, which is very discreet. The staff have big smiles and the chef’s forte is a great homemade pizza and a hearty breakfast (breakfast is included in the villa rate; all other provisions are on guest account).
We certainly had no complaints on our return visit to Villa Shinta Dewi Seminyak. This charming villa has been beautifully maintained and refreshed with new soft furnishings, a new non-slip floor in the gym, wall coverings and generous licks of paint. There are now two 47-inch flat screen TVs, one in the open-air lounge and one in the study, complete with surround-sound, which turns this cosy room into a small home theatre. The villa manager told us that all the guests love this room. In fact, reviewing the great choice of guest relaxation areas at Villa Shinta Dewi Seminyak, and after having spent a bit of time in the delightful sunset lounge, we decided to up the score a bit. We also increased the score for the staff, they’re a great team.

RUnpleasantSurprise.p: There’s a lot squeezed into a relatively small block of land, which means that there’s not much garden and limited space for kids to run around, so the villa is definitely more suited to a group of adults or families with older children.

REVIEW.Name: Johnathan Chan
REVIEW.ROverallComments: best villa stay ever

REVIEW.Name: Daniel Ward
REVIEW.ROverallComments: lovely place and great staff

REVIEW.Name: Sherylee Carroll
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Our stay at Villa Shinta Dewi was amazing. The villa was immaculate and offered luxury, relaxation and ambience. The staff were awesome. They were friendly and nothing was a problem. We didn't have to " lift a finger" during our entire stay. Thanks so much for a fantastic stay. We didn't want to leave. We hope to come back very soon.

REVIEW.Name: Kylie Lim
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Best villa I have visited in Bali. Will definitely go back again.

REVIEW.Name: Hugh Murphy
REVIEW.ROverallComments: This is a first class facility with a very competent staff who know how to look after their guests. We had 7 staying there and additional friends stopping by all the time so the staff were kept busy serving beers. It is important to note that there is no mark up on drinks that you bring in to the villa. This is a significant saving versus the 5 star hotels. Because of the location there is no need to prebook a car and driver. These are easily available after arrival.

REVIEW.Name: Edward Brown
REVIEW.ROverallComments:
We had such a fantastic time at Villa Shinta Dewi. The villa is beautiful an oasis close to the heart of Seminyak. We often forgot how close we were to it all it was so quiet and peaceful!
The staff were super friendly and very accommodating. Nothing was too much trouble.
I would recommend Villa Shinta Dewi in a heartbeat!

REVIEW.Name: Lisa Connor - Brent
REVIEW.ROverallComments: A truly amazing experience. This was our third visit and we just love returning to our Bali "home". Perfect location and a charming villa - but what sets Villa Shinta Dewi apart is the wonderful team who do everything they can to make sure you're stay is perfect. We can't thank Nong, Mawan, Manti and the rest of the villa staff enough. We will return in 2016.

REVIEW.Name: Getaways Villa
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Beautiful villa, Great Hot Chocolate, Yummy Food, Good advice. Best crepes ever, Friendly staff, Amazing service. Thank you very much for making our time in Bali so relaxed and enjoyable and for your flexibility with all of the changes due to the volcano!

REVIEW.Name: Getaways Villa
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you so much for one of our best family holidays ever! The staff were extremely excellent and cooked us a wonderful BBQ lunch! And even went out of their way to satisfy our Pak Malen Babi Guling craving. We have fallen in love with Bali. Thanks to all of you! We will be back!

REVIEW.Name: Pauline Mcgougan
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Wonderful Villa with the top staff looking after our every need. From pool towels to beers in the fridge and cooked dinners/ breakfasts. It was all so well organized, helpful and cheerful. What a lovely week. We hope you guys keep going so we can come back.

REVIEW.Name: Beijing Shanbannuo International Travel Service Co Ltd / imyway
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Very good!

REVIEW.Name: Simon Green
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you for a wonderful holiday, Villa amazing, the staff, how do you praise them enough, they certainly made our time in Bali special.

REVIEW.Name: Onefine stay/Travel Keys Onefine stay/Travel Keys
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you to the amazing staff of Villa Shinta Dewi. You have made our holiday so relaxing and enjoyable nothing was too much trouble and always with lovely Bali smile! Perfection and we will be back. We have gone from jockeys to sumo wrestlers in 10 days - and that was just the breakfasts. Thank you wonderful staff.

REVIEW.Name: Of Villas Ministry
REVIEW.ROverallComments: What a wonderful location. The villa exceeded our expectations in so many ways. The staff have been fabulous, always smiling, and no request was ever a problem, including arranging a birthday cake for one of our group. We have had a fantastic holiday. it is very difficult for us to go home :(

REVIEW.Name: Yen Yen Koh
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you for making our stay a memorable one. You are simply amazing. Everyone is so helpful and friendly. Thank you once again.

REVIEW.Name: Getaways Villa
REVIEW.ROverallComments: The wonderful staff at Shinta Dewi made us feel welcome and at home in Bali. We are grateful to them!! The villa itself is a great choice for our visit. The staff was extremely kind, attentive and professional. the location is terrific. We will remember the villa and the people here fondly.

REVIEW.Name: Bali Luxury Villas - BLV Bali Luxury Villas - BLV
REVIEW.ROverallComments: 5 stars quality service with a smile!

REVIEW.Name: Geralyn Danker
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank You very much for your warm hospitality, attentive care + generous concern for our holiday stay at your wonderful villa! We are touch by your wonderful + professional + caring service; you have made our holiday special + relaxing! Truly, Villa Shinta Dewi is an oasis for special holiday in Bali!

REVIEW.Name: Of Villas Ministry
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you so very much for all the wonderful care you have given us. The beautiful food, cocktails and smiles, made our week with you all so special. We have been so spoiled and I will miss my morning coffee by the pool. Thank you for the perfect stay. Thank you so much for providing us with an amazing holiday.

REVIEW.Name: Company The Private
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you for making our first family holiday so special. Amazing villa, excellent location but most importantly superb staff. You guys have really made our trip truly awesome.

REVIEW.Name: Barbara Champa Sutton
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you for having us. We had a wonderful stay here at the villa and in Bali. Beautiful staff and people.

REVIEW.Name: Tim Douglas
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you to all at Shinta Dewi for making our trip to Seminyak so wonderful. Helpful, courteous, wonderful staff, fantastic food and a setting to rival all others. A very enjoyable four days.

REVIEW.Name: Lawrence Chin
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We thank you for the warm hospitality and excellent service we received during our stay here at Villa Shinta Dewi. It might be a short stay but it is one holiday that our children were reluctant to leave! Tells you how much we love it here. Awesome swimming pool, nice food.

REVIEW.Name: TA Vilondo
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you for a fantastic three days holiday. Perfect service. Excellent food and an extremely nice crew.

REVIEW.Name: Amanda Moore
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thanks so much for a wonderful stay - literally the best and happiest service ever! 5 stars.

REVIEW.Name: Haiying Helen Jiang
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you for taking care of us!

REVIEW.Name: Caroline Ford
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you for taking such a great care of us all during our stay and also for your unending patience with our 7 boys. We all had an amazing time. Thank you so much.

REVIEW.Name: Ambrish Sukhani
REVIEW.ROverallComments: I had a wonderful time at the villa, the rooms were wonderful, the swimming pool was awesome, the food was great. The staff were wonderful, friendly and I love it, the smiles were beautiful.

REVIEW.Name: Company The Private
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Dear Shinta Staff. I have loved it here. The rooms have been amazing. The rooftop has a nice view of the sunset and the food was yum. I will be back soon...... As you can see, our daughter and son have had amazing holiday here in Bali and staying at the beautiful Shinta Dewi has made it even more memorable. From the incredible service, impeccable friendliness to the relaxing atmosphere. We have all had a wonderful break away from reality and will be back!! Thank you, Thank you and Thank you.

REVIEW.Name: Scott Maguire
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Our stay here were superb!! The staff were amazing and the children were totally spoiled! The rooms were fantastic and so clean. We love our family stay with you all and would love to come again. Staff were very friendly and exceptionally great with children, chef was such a good cook and very accommodating. As a family, we enjoyed the experience immensely. A big thank you!!

REVIEW.Name: Julie Thomas
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We all had a marvelous time. Many thanks for making this trip so special and memorable for all of us. Excellent service. Love every minute of our stay. Will be back.

REVIEW.Name: The World @ Braeside Travel
REVIEW.ROverallComments: A very big thank you to all the staff who looked after us so well. Such kindness and generosity of nature. We very much appreciate your hard work, time and effort, it has made our stay very relaxing and enjoyable. Keep up the good work.

REVIEW.Name: Bianca Dowdell
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Wow, what a Team. You all made our stay at Shinta Dewi an amazing experience everyday. Thank you all so much for your care, attentive service and discreet manner in which you respect our time here. It has been 10/10 on every part and we feel blessed to have our Bali experience with each of you. We obviously don't want to leave this fabulous home - away from home - paradise, but will definitely be back!!! Thank you!

REVIEW.Name: Getaways Villa
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thanks to the whole team who made our stay so relaxing and enjoyable. No request was too much, including assisting with cash until we could get some changed. I would never have expected that and the ease with which it was offered amazed me. Thank you to looking after the kids so we could go out at night, and all the bookings, taxis, etc. All in all so much more of a personal experience than we could have had in any resort! No matter what the hour, the whole team was ready to serve... and always with a smile. So very different to my previous Bali experience 20 years ago and will make me want to return again for sure!

REVIEW.Name: Melbourne Travel Call
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Our stay was amazing in every respect especially made by the wonderful staff who made us feel that we were part of their family.

REVIEW.Name: Caroline Leong
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Food is great, good sound system!

REVIEW.Name: Mata Bali Mata Bali
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Stunning villa. Amazing staff. Absolutely happy guest!

REVIEW.Name: Trevor Watts
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Lovely Staff + Villa. We enjoyed our stay at Shinta Dewi immensely, will definitely recommend to our friends. Thank you to staff.

REVIEW.Name: Of Villas Ministry
REVIEW.ROverallComments: You have made this our best stay in Bali so far. The discreet service and friendly manner made our stay here very special. Thanks for putting up with us late at night when we were noisy and thirsty. We promise we will come back to Villa Shinta Dewi again.

REVIEW.Name: Elisha Symya
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thanks to the team at Shinta Dewi for making our stay comfortable and we felt so welcomed all the time. Thanks for accommodating especially our children needs; pool fence, baby chairs, baby food... We had an excellent stay!

REVIEW.Name: Linda Berends
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We had the best time staying at your beautiful villa. Everyone of the staff was welcoming and looked after us extremely well. We can't wait to come back again. Congratulation to Nong the manager and the chef for providing us with the holiday of our dreams.

REVIEW.Name: Michael Brady
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Robert and I were overwhelmed by the beauty of this place and the warm hospitality of the people who work here. We certainly hope to return in the future and share Villa Shinta Dewi with more of our family and friends. Thank you for the extraordinary experience!

REVIEW.Name: Penny Brewster
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We are a group of six and celebrating four 70th birthdays. The staff exceed our expectations, thank you.

REVIEW.Name: GEORGIE ABAY
REVIEW.ROverallComments: To all the lovely staff, thank you so much! We had the most wonderful week and will always remember the fantastic food and staff. Thank you so much.

REVIEW.Name: Patrick Colledge
REVIEW.ROverallComments: To the owners - you have a great place, great team and it was great value. The villa is awesome as is the location. The staff could not have been better, they were so attentive, always at hand no matter what time and most importantly always happy, they made our stay the pleasure it was. Thank you to all and well done for being good at what you do.

REVIEW.Name: Holiday Villa Rental Bali Villa Escapes
REVIEW.ROverallComments: To the team at Shinta Dewi, thanks for the great experience. Your team made the stay enjoyable and relaxing, with nothing too much trouble. Such an amazing villa and team to look after your every need. Thank you to you all.

REVIEW.Name: PRASANNA DEVI GANGADHARAN
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you for the wonderful stay and looking after us so warmly. Amazing villa and staff. Thanks for the awesome time, great care for my 1 year old grandson. Thank you for giving us a wonderful holiday.

REVIEW.Name: TA Vilondo
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you team Shinta Dewi. You score very high on hospitality ratings. Excellent, superb efficiency. Ever smiling faces. Friendly, attentive to all our needs. It was a home away from home. Thoroughly relaxed here, massages were heavenly. Simply outstanding ambience. Helpful, willing butlers. Manager Nong past excellence!!! Treasure contacts to shop. Chef is very good. He cook baby and kids special meals, well on time every single day. Stupendous!! Can't wait to come back!! Cheers. All our best to you all.

REVIEW.Name: Claire Toshach
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Fantastic stay, wonderful and attentive staff, and the villa was perfect! We had a blast and will be back! Suksama! Great villa - awesome staff - happy smiles - we loved it!

REVIEW.Name: Susan Worthington
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you so much for a wonderful weekend! The staff have been so attentive, smiley, helpful, warm and friendly - faultless service. Delicious breakfast and the villa is beautiful. We have loved staying here.

REVIEW.Name: Elaine Sin
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you for the great service! The chef is excellent and we enjoyed the BBQ very much. We love all the sauces provided especially the garlic butter sauce. We enjoyed our stay tremendously!

REVIEW.Name: Sue Lees
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you Villa Shinta Dewi for a wonderful holiday. Your villa is beautiful, well set out and beautifully decorated. Each room was made for relaxation and comfort. Your pool was heaven to swim in, the towels arrived fresh and dry and the shade created an oasis in the Bali heat. Your staff are perfect! They could not be more attentive and kind. Mawan made everything perfect, Manti was so calm and caring and Witana made such an amazing dinner! Better than the 5*'s dinners in Seminyak restaurants! Wayan and Gun were helpful and kind. All up...An amazing villa experience! Thank you. Staff were amazing! Food was amazing, best breakfasts and dinners we've had so far out of all of our villa stays.

REVIEW.Name: Jeanie Moullin
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you to all the villa staff at Shinta Dewi for making our holiday fabulous! The food and beverages were excellent, of a very high standard. A special thank you to the villa staff for taking such good care of us. You are all so kind and helpful and we would not have had such a fantastic stay without you. We hope to see you soon. Thank you again.

REVIEW.Name: Ian Gilbert
REVIEW.ROverallComments: What can I say, we have enjoyed our second stay in this little peace of paradise. We love Villa Shinta Dewi and the staff have all made us feel at home and comfortable. Thank you so much. And chef is top quality!!! We have all gained a few Kgs. Thank you. Thank you. Appreciate all the little things especially my tea on the roof top. All the best. We have had such a great time. Just keep up the good work and the quality of what you do. It has been fantastic.

REVIEW.Name: Holiday Villa Rental Bali Villa Escapes
REVIEW.ROverallComments: What a beautiful villa with fantastic, kind, caring staff. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay and were impressed with the location. The chef was brilliant and we loved the breakfast. Thanks for everything.

REVIEW.Name: Bali Family Villas
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you for looking after us so well. We all had a fantastic break. We love the beautiful fresh breakfast, and the endless cups of tea and cocktails! Thank you all for the guidance re restaurants, day trips, spas, etc, etc, etc. The villa was also amazing and immaculately kept. Pool was divine. Such a great place to recharge the batteries. We will be back. Well done guys xx.

REVIEW.Name: Bali hospitality group Bali hospitality group
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you so much for the amazing experience - this was our first time visiting Bali but you made this truly special and unforgettable. All the service, foods and drinks were well thought out and we were very much pleased about it. We would definitely share our experience with our friends and colleagues and also plan to come back very soon. Thank you again and wish the very best luck to all of you and your family. Thank you so much for your wonderful hospitality!

REVIEW.Name: Fiona Chesney
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you for a lovely stay, we have had a great time, and particularly enjoy the lovely breakfast and pool. The staff have all been very helpful and friendly. Thank you for helping to make our time spent in Bali absolutely fantastic! We really enjoyed staying in Villa Shinta Dewi and it worked excellently for our family. Thanks again.

REVIEW.Name: Holiday Villa Rental Bali Villa Escapes
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Excellent stay.

REVIEW.Name: Kim Heng
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you so much for looking after us so well during our stay. We had a wonderful time and really enjoyed our time here.

REVIEW.Name: Russell Butler
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We had a fabulous stay - thank you so much for your attentive care. The hospitality extended to us by all was excellent. Such a beautiful oasis for relaxation stay. The staff were wonderful. Thank you to all the staff at Villa Shinta Dewi, simply stunning. The property is lovely but what made the stay was your fabulous care. We will definitely be back!

REVIEW.Name: Jemma Dudley-Smith
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Wow! What a relaxing, enjoyable, peaceful stay we have had here in your beautiful villa.The BBQ dinner was seriously amazing. We will be dreaming of this dinner when we're back in Sydney. We have felt very welcome and cared for here. Thank you to everyone.

REVIEW.Name: Neil Lee
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you so much for a lovely stay. We all had a great time. The staff and service was so friendly and excellent. Thank you for everything.

REVIEW.Name: Mary Rossi Travel - Lindfield
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Elite Havens certainly manage some amazing villas in Bali and this villa does not disappoint. The staff are kind, considerate, discrete and always greet you with a welcoming smile. The villa is luxurious in every way, well maintained, beautifully clean, excellent breakfast, fresh and delicious. The service is very similar to a Four Season Hotel. Thank you for a wonderful 6 nights. Just amazing. I have been to Bali 20 times or more. Staying at Shinta Dewi has been my best, thank you to the staff that made this holiday amazing.

REVIEW.Name: Brooke Clarke
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We have been very impressed with every aspect of the villa especially the amazing staff. All the staff made our holiday memorable.

REVIEW.Name: Pedro Braga
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We can not put into words how beautiful our stay in this villa was. The staff was excellent, catered for our every need and always greeted us with lovely smiles. Breakfast was delicious very morning. Our compliments to the Chef. The villa Shinta Dewi team make our holiday feels like paradise. Thank you. Thank you. Thank you.

REVIEW.Name: Holiday Villa Rental Bali Villa Escapes
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We have had a wonderful time in your villa!. Very well located indeed, very clean and the staff have been simply wonderful. Your English is so good and the breakfast delicious. We hope you have lots of guests despite the rambling volcano. You certainly deserve it. Thank you very much.

REVIEW.Name: Holiday Villa Rental Bali Villa Escapes
REVIEW.ROverallComments: The villa itself is absolutely amazing and so well maintained by the brilliant staff. They didn't have the easiest time with 14 guys on a bunch do, but they managed it so well!. Always making sure we had beers and an amazing breakfast to start the day. Will definitely recommending Villa Shinta Dewi and the villa across to all my friends coming to Bali. Thanks again.

REVIEW.Name: Nadine Borter
REVIEW.ROverallComments: It was mesmerizing and excellent.

REVIEW.Name: Company The Private
REVIEW.ROverallComments: What a magical four days we have had staying in this paradise with such a professional staff. Divine food, lovely and creative drinks and a scrumptious breakfast to start the day. Caring and helpful staff, magical pool and the cutest wildlife. Thank you for making our stay wonderful.

REVIEW.Name: Giovanna Fragomeli
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Bali we love you! As always a place for memories, relaxation and happiness. Bali people are just amazing and this place was great for our family. Staff is just a delight. Thank you.

REVIEW.Name: Lisa .
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We are from Jakarta and really happy to stay at the villa. It's nice and clean. The staff also very helpful. The breakfast is perfect. It comes in a very nice food presentation like in the 5 stars hotel. Overall all good, once again thank you.

REVIEW.Name: Company The Private
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We have been welcomed by you all with such love and kindness during our stay. Your warm smiles and calm presence has made our stay here most enjoyable and relaxing. We are without a doubt going to miss you all and hope that you all enjoyed our company as much as we have enjoyed yours. With love and hugs.

REVIEW.Name: Thibault Jean-Philippe Bertschy
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you so much for this amazing service. The staff was very professional and nice and made our holiday so special and perfect!

REVIEW.Name: Nicole Maree Dickson
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you Mawan, Manti, Witana, Wayan and Nong. You have all been fantastic - nothing was too much bother. You all made my 50th birthday a birthday I will never forget. Exceptional villa, clean, tidy and beautiful. A+ service and facilities. Thank you so much.

REVIEW.Name: Narelle Therese Sinclair
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you for all the staff at Shinta Dewi. Your service has been above amazing. Nothing has been too hard plus the special little touches have just added to this. We have loved every moment by far the best villa I have ever stayed in. A wonderful time had by all a great time for Narelle's "60". The staff were amazing. Thank you for your outstanding hospitality during our stay. I had the most wonderful time and we truly appreciate all you do. Love to come again.

REVIEW.Name: Martin Nicholas Dacron
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you to the villa staff for making our holiday in Bali one that we will never forget! Amazing villa, amazing pool and amazing staff. The children had a ball running around the villa. We will miss the beautiful breakfast and daily cappuccinos.

REVIEW.Name: Of Villas Ministry
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Many many thanks for an amazing stay in your beautiful villa. The best location, great attention to detail in the rooms and fantastic layout. Your service has been exceptional, often fulfilling our needs before we knew had them. The food was restaurant quality in both presentation and flavour and couldn't be recommended more highly. Above all, your friendly smiling faces made our days very enjoyable. We will be back!

REVIEW.Name: Of Villas Ministry
REVIEW.ROverallComments: The satff are exceptional. We have loved every minute spent here and will definitely back again. We feel very lucky to have stayed here.

REVIEW.Name: Jacqueline Benjamin
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you, thank you, thank you! What an amazing piece of paradise. We were here in Bali to celebrate a friends 60th. We've individually all visited Bali many many times - and this villa and the staff exceeded all our expectations. The villa is so beautiful and the staff are so kind and attentive. We have been very lucky and enjoyed our stay immensely. We looked forward to visiting again.

REVIEW.Name: Company The Private
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Many thanks for your caring service over the last week. We have been pampered, waited on and every wish has been granted. The facilities are excellent. The garden sensational. Nothing was to much trouble. Thank you for helping us all celebrate our 40th wedding anniversaries.

REVIEW.Name: Jetset Tours Rosebay
REVIEW.ROverallComments: What an amazing holiday! We all had such a great time. The staff in the villa were so amazing. Nothing was ever too much. We will be back. Thank you for everything. The kids loved all the staff.

REVIEW.Name: Holiday Villa Rental Bali Villa Escapes
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you for a very relaxing stay. The staff have been incredible. We loved the food. The seafood barbecue was our favourite. This is the perfect place for a family holiday. Thank you and see you next time.

REVIEW.Name: Holiday Villa Rental Bali Villa Escapes
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Shinta Dewi is a home away from home - except in my home there is nobody cooks and cleans for me, so actually this is more like heaven on earth. The staff are so kind and attentive, Manti, Mawan, Chef Witana, Wayan, Nong - we have loved being looked after so well by you and we will be back, thank you.

REVIEW.Name: Kym Nelson
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you so much! We love coming to Bali and the hospitality is like no where in the world! Beautiful staff, spoiled us so much. You went above and beyond to look after us during our stay. It is a lovely villa in a great location. Look forward to coming back soon especially for the Nasi Goreng and Banana pancake. Will definitely recommend to other people.

REVIEW.Name: Jignesh Vithalbhai Patel
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you for making our stay comfortable and making us feel at home. The villa facilities were excellent. Also the staff members were friendly, cooperative and caring. Thank you for making our stay a memorable one! We would surely love to come back soon.

REVIEW.Name: Linn Benedikte De Rham
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you all for a wonderful stay at Shinta Dewi. We all had a superb time and felt very well looked after! We'll definitely recommend the villa and would love to come back.

REVIEW.Name: Andianstyle
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Wonderful staff and service was excellent. We will definitely come back for a longer stay. Highly recommended, central to everything - beaches, shopping and lots of cool cafes.

REVIEW.Name: Luxindo Property
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We'll never forget your hospitality and gentle smiles. Thank you so much. See you soon.

REVIEW.Name: Getaways Villa
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Fantastic hospitality, excellent service, beautiful villa. Surely will come again.

REVIEW.Name: !Michelle Pickard
REVIEW.ROverallComments: This place is amazing. Everyday we woke up to a delicious breakfast. The service was amazing and the people were kind and friendly. We amused ourselves everyday in the pool and when we came back inside, the rooms were immaculate. All the activities we did were well organized by the staff. Overall we had a great time here, we would recommend it to anyone and never want to leave. Special thanks to Wayan, Mawan, Manti and chef.

REVIEW.Name: Holiday Villa Rental Bali Villa Escapes
REVIEW.ROverallComments: To all the beautiful and friendly staff at Villa Shinta Dewi. We have had such a beautiful four days here. You all been so accommodating and never without a smile! The kids have had a ball. Our only regret is not staying longer. We will definitely back. Thank you! Thank you!

REVIEW.Name: Vaibhavi Patil Patil
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Villa Shinta Dewi is an idyllic paradise! Not only does it have the most beautiful environment but even lovelier staff who make it their mission to keep you happy and comfortable. We love the environment-friendly bathrooms and the food we had here was both delicious and authentic. We wished we could spend more time here. We would have loved to spend more time at the pool and the gorgeous terrace upstairs. Thanks for a very warm and comfortable stay - Nong, Witana, Billy, and all the lovely staff. Cheers!

REVIEW.Name: Michael Buckley
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you so much for having me here with some of my best friends for my birthday. Thank you for friendly service, food and smiles. It has been a great weekend. Thank you to all the staff, you've been awesome! Your service is second to none. We hope to come back again soon.
